doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 26 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 6/23/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 26 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 6/23/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Maine: Obscenity referendum to ban items of a sexual nature defeated2. Massachusetts: Bill passed assuring privacy protection for HTLVIII positive personsCOMMERCIAL: Urban General Warehouse Sale3. Interview with John Glines, discussing Stamp Out AIDS Project4. Missouri: Anti-gay lawmaker fails in an attempt to ban gays from teaching in schools5. Andy Humm discusses the 17th Anniversary of the Stonewall riotsCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine6. Mayor Edward Koch attacked by homophobe at the Proclamation for Lesbian and Gay Pride Week, with clip7. Adair Films loses its contract to make an AIDS documentary to a non-gay companyCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp8. Hawaii: Governor signs measure ensuring confidentiality of those testing positive for sexually transmitted diseases9. Lesbians at high risk for discrimination following the AIDS epidemic, despite being at lowest risk for the disease10. Call for volunteers for a national study of drug treatments to treat AIDS/HTLVIII positive persons11. Researchers grow AIDS virus in animal cells for the first time12. Announcements about Gay Pride Weekend COMMERCIAL: New York City Gay Men's Chorus13. Sports Report14. Outreach: Conversations with GMHC: Interview with Psychotherapist Michael Shernoff discussing eroticizing safer sex15. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Coverage of the Cincinnati Gay Pride Parade, includes clips of the march, the mayor reading equal rights amendment, GCN ensemble singing "Steppin' Out"COMMERCIAL: New York City Gay Men's Chorus2. Interview with David Summers, cabaret singer and AIDS activist, regarding "Hero of My Own Life," with clipCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" magazine3. Announcement of "Ten By Tennessee" production of Tennessee Williams' plays4. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 26 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 6/23/1986]: June 1986
